title: 49 Prime Day Beauty Deals You Don't Want to Miss
description: Beauty-lovers, the last few hours of Amazon's October Prime Day are here, and there are plenty of beauty discounts you need to take advantage of before it's too late. As shopping experts and Prime Day pros, we hunted down the best Prime Day beauty deals you don't want to miss. There is no shortage of bang-for-your-buck beauty offers, including makeup, hair care, skin care, nail care, and body care, plus several editor-favorite picks from brands like Laneige, Caudalie, and more. This is your chance to stock up on your beauty essentials on a budget or try something new without breaking the bank. Ahead, you can check out our editor-backed and top-rated Prime Day beauty recommendations. Hurry, it's the last day to score those discounts and deals. Our Favorite Amazon Prime Day Beauty Deals to Shop The "buttery smooth skin" lotion: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Lotion at $10, originally $25 For diminishing breakouts: Differin Gel at $19, originally $29 A hair tool that can do it all: Shark FlexStyle Hair Dryer & Powerful Styling System at $240, originally $320 A deal on depuffing and brightening eye patches: Grace & Stella Eye Mask Eye Patch at $30, originally $55 A hair oil for scalp care and soft, shiny strands: Squigs Gooseberry Delight Hair Oil at $30, originally $37 Keep scrolling to shop our top picks, and if you're looking for more deals, check out PS's editor-curated Amazon Prime Day Sale picks and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Plus, make sure you sign up for Amazon Prime so that you don't miss a moment of the sale. Update on October 9, 2024 at 8:30 PM ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products. Related: Last-Minute Under-$25 October Prime Day Deals to Shop ASAP
author: Anvita Reddy
excerpt: We curated the best beauty deals during Amazon's October Prime Day, including discounts on makeup, skin care, body care, hair care, hair tools, and more.
text: While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.Beauty-lovers, the last few hours of Amazon's October Prime Day are here, and there are plenty of beauty discounts you need to take advantage of before it's too late. As shopping experts and Prime Day pros, we hunted down the best Prime Day beauty deals you don't want to miss. There is no shortage of bang-for-your-buck beauty offers, including makeup, hair care, skin care, nail care, and body care, plus several editor-favorite picks from brands like Laneige, Caudalie, and more. This is your chance to stock up on your beauty essentials on a budget or try something new without breaking the bank. Ahead, you can check out our editor-backed and top-rated Prime Day beauty recommendations. Hurry, it's the last day to score those discounts and deals. Our Favorite Amazon Prime Day Beauty Deals to Shop The "buttery smooth skin" lotion: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Lotion at $10, originally $25 For diminishing breakouts: Differin Gel at $19, originally $29 A hair tool that can do it all: Shark FlexStyle Hair Dryer & Powerful Styling System at $240, originally $320 A deal on depuffing and brightening eye patches: Grace & Stella Eye Mask Eye Patch at $30, originally $55 A hair oil for scalp care and soft, shiny strands: Squigs Gooseberry Delight Hair Oil at $30, originally $37 Keep scrolling to shop our top picks, and if you're looking for more deals, check out PS's editor-curated Amazon Prime Day Sale picks and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Plus, make sure you sign up for Amazon Prime so that you don't miss a moment of the sale. Update on October 9, 2024 at 8:30 PM ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products. PS Photography | Kelsey GarciaBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Hydrating EssenceCosrx Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence ($13, originally $25) If you have dry, irritated skin, this viral snail mucin essence will help with hydration. The lightweight essence soothes redness, brightens the skin, and helps repair your moisture barrier without feeling greasy. Stock up on it while it's on sale for the upcoming dry winter. One editor raved about the product in her Cosrx Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence review. Editor Quote: "My skin's texture has actually improved, and it feels way more even now. The hydration payoff is also huge, and I feel like it actually helps my moisturizer work better, too." — Kelsey Garcia, associate content director, BalancePS Photography | Anvita ReddyBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Lip BalmLaneige Lip Sleeping Mask ($17, originally $24) The Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask is one of the bestselling items on Amazon, and it's worth stocking up on during Prime Day. This hydrating lip mask can revive even the driest lips overnight, featuring ingredients like coconut oil and shea butter. One editor raves about the product in her review of the Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask. Editor Quote: "This lip mask isn't sticky or uncomfortable — it glides on smoothly and feels very soothing on my lips." — Macy Cate Williams, former content director, ShoppingPS Photography | Marisa PetrarcaBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Teeth Whitening StripsCrest 3D Whitestrips ($30, originally $46) Brighten your teeth in just one use with the Crest 3D Whitestrips. It comes with a total of 44 strips, including two bonus one hour express treatments. The key ingredient here is hydrogen peroxide, which helps lift stains from coffee, tea, and wine. Apply the no-slip strips to top and bottom teeth, let them sit for 30 minutes, and remove them. One PS editor detailed her experience using the strips in her review of the Crest 3D Whitestrips. Editor Quote: "After just four treatments, the difference is already remarkable. The 'before' image on the left and the 'after' image on the right clearly show the noticeable change. And I've barely made a dent in the box with plenty of treatments left." — Marisa Petrarca, PS contributoramazon.comBest Prime Day Deal on Eye PatchesGrace & Stella Eye Mask Eye Patch ($30, originally $55) Constantly suffering from puffy under eyes? Don't worry, the Grace & Stella Eye Mask Eye Patch set has you covered. They're formulated to treat puffiness, dark circles, and fine lines, which makes them the perfect pick to add to your morning routine. Use them as a way to brighten up your under-eye area after waking up, or wear them while you apply eye makeup to avoid any issues with eyeshadow fallout. It comes with 48 pairs. PS Photography | Kelsey GarciaBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Lip BalmLaneige Lip Glowy Balm ($13, originally $19) If you love the bestselling Lip Sleeping Mask from Laneige, you'll also love this Glowy Balm version as well. The difference between the two is that this one is slightly less thick but perfect for on-the-go use. The Glowy Balm also has a shinier finish that's perfect for topping off your lip, and it comes in a bunch of flavors. Learn more in our Laneige Lip Glowy Balm review. Editor Quote: "What's nice about the lip balm is that it has a similar consistency to the fan-favorite Lip Sleeping Mask — the brand's creamy overnight lip treatment — but slightly thinner and therefore better suited to wear throughout the day. Plus, the tube applicator makes it easy to swipe on when on the go, and it fits easily inside a purse or a pocket." — Kelsey Garcia, associate content director, BalancePS Photography | Naomi ParrisBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Acne PatchesHero Cosmetics Original Mighty Patch ($16, originally $22) The Mighty Patch from Hero Cosmetics are there for all your breakout woes. These medical-grade hydrocolloid patches diminish blemishes practically overnight by absorbing all the gunk from your whiteheads. With these in your skin-care arsenal, you won't be tempted to pick and prod at your zits. It comes with 72 patches. Learn more in our editor's review of the Mighty Patch patches. Editor Quote: "From its unmatched staying power to the undeniable results, I can say that the Hero Cosmetics Mighty Acne Patch truly lives up to the hype. Thanks to its gel formula, the patch gently clings to the skin for hours while effortlessly absorbing all of the gunk in the pimple. This is great, whether you're a heavy sleeper or on the go all day. It also helps you beat the annoying temptation of picking at your face, which helps prevent scabs and scarring caused by popping pimples." — Naomi Parris, PS contributorPS Photography | Renee RodriguezBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Hydrating Sheet MasksBiodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask ($13, originally $19) The viral Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask is on sale during Prime Day, and it's the perfect time to stock up on the deeply hydrating sheet mask. It is supposed to help minimize the appearance of pores and deliver glass-skin and firming results. This set comes with four treatments, which is a steal for only $13. Use it whenever you need a hydration boost, including post-flight. Read our Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask review for more. Editor Quote: "I find it to be ultra-hydrating, and it hasn't bothered my acne-prone skin or exacerbated any breakouts. I fully plan on continuing to purchase this mask and use it once a week, especially the night before a date or a special event." - Renee Rodriguez, staff writer and social produceramazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on an Eye CreamBeauty of Joseon Revive Eye Serum ($11, originally $17) Formulated with retinal and niacinamide, this eye treatment will help brighten the undereye area, diminishing dark circles and fine lines. It's a gentle yet effective treatment suitable for all skin types. Store it in the fridge for an extra cooling, depuffing effect.amazon.comBest Prime Day Deal on a Lip SerumLux Unfiltered No. 15 Soothing Lip Serum ($21, originally $26) Make dry, cracked lips a thing of the past with the Lux Unfiltered No. 15 Soothing Lip Serum. It's packed with hydrating ingredients like hyaluronic acid, squalane, and liquid shea butter. Plus, the packaging features a cooling applicator tip, which makes for an even more luxurious experience.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Micellar WaterBioderma Sensibio H2O Micellar Water ($13, originally $19) Take the day off with the cult-favorite Bioderma Sensibio H2O Micellar Water. It removes even the most stubborn eye makeup, all with a few swipes. Plus, it's great for all skin types. With this price cut, you might as well add a few to your cart and stock up.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Tinted SunscreenEltaMD UV Physical Tinted Sunscreen SPF 41 ($35, originally $44) EltaMD's sunscreens are a dermatologist favorite and sensitive-friendly, so when you can get it on sale, you might as well stock up. This tinted mineral sunscreen from EltaMD is great for those with acne-prone or sensitive skin. It's nongreasy and leaves a matte finish.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on an Exfoliating TonerPaula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant ($28, originally $35) From breakouts to enlarged pores, the Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant is a bestseller and viral favorite for those with acne-prone or oily skin. It contains salicylic acid to gently exfoliate the skin while clearing up pores. There's no better time to stock up.PS Photography | Anvita ReddyBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a SunscreenInnisfree Daily UV Defense Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 36 ($13, originally $18) The Innisfree sunscreen feels like a lightweight moisturizer with its water-based formula. Containing skin-calming ingredients like green tea, cica, and sunflower seed oil, this product is perfect for all skin types. Plus, it doesn't leave behind a white cast, but rather a hydrated glow. Read more in our Innisfree Daily UV Defense Sunscreen review. Editor Quote: "In comparison to many other sunscreens I've tried in the past, the Innisfree Daily UV Defense Sunscreen has the best texture. It's smooth and creamy, kind of like a balmy moisturizer, but it still feels so refreshing and lightweight on the skin that I often forget I have SPF on and accidentally double up (which is never a bad idea). Plus, it sets and absorbs nearly immediately after I blend it in. I'm left with a subtle, dewy glow with a natural, skin-like finish. It doesn't make me look like a glazed doughnut, but I don't look extra oily or shiny, either." — ARPS Photography | Jessica HarringtonBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on an Acne TreatmentDifferin Acne Treatment Gel ($19, originally $29) If you have acne-prone skin, there's no better time to stock up on the Differin Acne Treatment Gel. The 0.1 percent adapalene gel is a retinoid treatment best used at night to help diminish acne, post-acne marks, and discoloration over time. Although similar to its prescription strength counterpart, this treatment is a gentler option if you're looking for something effective but not as potent. Learn more about one editor's experience with the product in her review of the Differin Acne Treatment Gel. Editor Quote: "It only took about a month for my skin to get used to, and now, I use it every night with zero irritation. I'm not going to sit here and tell you the Differin Acne Treatment and Differin Acne Treatment alone cleared up my acne, because that's not the case — the spironolactone prescription had a large hand in that — but I can tell you the gel has helped brighten and even out my complexion to the point that you can hardly tell I ever experienced those hormonal breakouts to begin with." — Jessica Harrington, senior editor, Beautyamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Cleansing OilAnua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil ($14, originally $20) Oil cleansing does wonders for gently breaking down makeup, sunscreen, and the grime from the day. However, it can also help with eliminating blackheads and clearing out your pores. The Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil will do just that with its soothing formula containing heartleaf extract. Just massage this into your skin for a minute or two, emulsify it into a milky texture with a little bit of water, and wash it away for a smoother, softer complexion.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Hydrating TonerLaneige Cream Skin Refillable Toner & Moisturizer ($25, originally $36) Laneige's Cream Skin Refillable Toner & Moisturizer is another viral product from the brand for its skin-fortifying capabilities. This milky toner is packed with ceramides and peptides to deeply hydrate and repair the skin without feeling too heavy. Whether you're a retinol user or tend to have a damaged skin barrier, this will help diminish irritation and flakiness. Stock up while it's on a major markdown.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a CleanserLa Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Facial Cleanser ($14, originally $18) If you have normal to oily/combination skin, the La Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Facial Cleanser is a no-nonsense cleanser that will get the job done. It is gentle on skin while still being effective enough to remove dirt, makeup, and excess oil. It's formulated with ceramides, niacinamide, and glycerin to help the skin maintain its moisture barrier. It's worth stocking up on while it's under $15.PS Photography | Jessica HarringtonBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a SunscreenBliss Block Star Invisible Daily Sunscreen SPF 30 ($12, originally $25) Save a few bucks on this editor-favorite sunscreen that's acne prone and sensitive skin-friendly. The 100 percent mineral formula has a light tint, which makes it perfect for no makeup-makeup days. Read our full Bliss Block Star Invisible Daily Sunscreen review. Editor Quote: "The texture is my favorite part — it's incredibly lightweight and silky, and dries to a soft, blurred finish that's not matte but also not dewy. It just looks like healthy skin. Very little effort is required to blend it in, which makes the application experience all the more enjoyable. I have a normal skin type, but I find the product hydrating without being greasy." — JHamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a MoisturizerTula Skin Care 24-7 Hydrating Day & Night Cream ($34, originally $54) If you're looking for a hydrating moisturizer for the summer, the Tula Skin Care 24-7 Hydrating Day & Night Cream is lightweight and great for all skin types. It's formulated with hyaluronic acid, apple, watermelon, peptides, squalane, and a proprietary blend of prebiotics and probiotic extracts to help repair the skin's barrier.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a RetinolObagi360 Retinol 0.5 Cream ($60, originally $75) If you're someone who wants to get into the retinol game but needs something gentle, this one by Obagi360 is perfect for those with sensitive skin. You get all the benefits of retinol — including a reduced appearance of fine lines and dark spots — without the irritation. It's best to use this at night. You can try using it once or twice a week, and work up to using it every other day.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Dark Spot SerumCaudalie Vinoperfect Brightening Dark Spot Serum ($66, originally $82) We're huge fans of Caudalie's Vinoperfect Radiance Serum, but we also know how pricey it is, so why not take advantage of the 20 percent off savings and stock up? Formulated with grapevine sap, which is said to have more brightening effects than vitamin C, this serum delivers radiance and an even skin tone with consistent use. Whether you're dealing with dark spots and hyperpigmentation or overall dullness, this gentle formula is perfect for those with sensitive skin. Read one editor's thoughts and see before-and-after pictures in her Caudalie Vinoperfect Brightening Dark Spot Serum review. Editor Quote: "It is one of the best gentle dark spot treatments on the market. No matter how many products I try, I always come back to this serum. When I need to scale back my routine and take a gentler approach, this formula allows me to do so and continue to target my hyperpigmentation and even out my skin tone. Plus, it helps with hydrating and calming my skin." — ARPS Photography | Marisa PetrarcaBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Cleansing BalmElemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm ($48, originally $69) The Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm has a silky texture that makes removing your makeup a relaxing experience. It starts as a gel-like balm but transforms into a milky oil as it's massaged into the skin with water. To see why it's worth it, check out our review of the Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm. Editor Quote: "Within seconds, the formula melts even waterproof makeup formulas off of my face. What's more, my skin feels softer to the touch immediately after cleansing. Forget the feeling of stripped skin — this balm will leave your complexion feeling wildly silky and soothed." — Marisa Petrarca, PS Contributoramazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Peel PadsDr. Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peel Pads ($122, originally $153) If you want the effectiveness of an in-office peel from the comfort of your home — and at a fraction of the price — that's where the Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare's peel pads come in. The two-step process is great for brightening the skin while fading existing dark spots and preventing breakouts. It has a potent blend of glycolic acid, salicylic acid, and lactic acid as the first step. The second step helps to neutralize any inflammation. This value size box has 60 treatments, which should last you at least two months if you use it daily, or even longer if it's something you use every other day or less.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Vitamin C SerumTatcha Violet-C Brightening Serum ($62, originally $89) Several products from Tatcha are on sale during Prime Day, and we're adding this powerful Violet-C Brightening Serum to our carts. This serum is gentle yet effective in fading dark spots and brightening your skin. It's formulated with 20 percent vitamin C and a 10 percent AHA blend, a potent mix that is meant to be used at night.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Tinted MoisturizerBareMinerals Complexion Rescue Tinted Moisturizer SPF 30 ($31, originally $39) BareMinerals's Complexion Rescue Tinted Moisturizer is all you need to streamline your morning routine for a "no-makeup" makeup look. The tinted moisturizer has a decent amount of coverage for a tinted moisturizer with it's medium-buildable wear. It has a skin-like luminous finish that feels hydrating on the skin. Read the full editor review. Editor Quote: "Filled with skin-loving ingredients, specifically protective ingredients such as titanium dioxide and iron oxides, BareMinerals will be my complexion's lifelong daytime best friend. It's truly made embracing 'skinimalism' that much easier." — Anvita Reddy, assistant editor, commerceamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Brow PencilAnastasia Beverly Hills Brow Wiz ($15, originally $25) Anastasia Beverly Hills's Brow Wiz glides on with ease and delivers the most natural look. The double-ended spoolie brush allows you to shape your arches to perfection before and after penciling. Start with light, feathery strokes that mimic your actual brow hairs, then fill in more heavily in sparse areas. It comes in a variety of colors.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a FoundationLancôme Teint Idole Ultra Wear Buildable Full Coverage Foundation ($40, originally $57) The bestselling Lancôme Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is on sale right now, and it's the perfect time to stock up for those holiday parties. It has a lightweight feel but a full coverage wear, so you'll have a flawless base without feeling cakey. It has a gorgeous skin-like matte finish as well.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a MascaraIt Cosmetics Superhero Mascara ($16, originally $28) The It Cosmetics Superhero Mascara is under $25, and it's worth stocking up on. It gives your lashes an instant lift, as well as volumizes and lengthens to give you a fluttery, fanned-out look. It's lengthening without the clumps, and the unique shape of the brush lets you reach and separate every lash from root to tip.PS Photography | Renee RodriguezBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Blowdryer BrushRevlon One Step Volumizer Plus 2.0 Hair Dryer and Hot Air Brush ($37, originally $70) Get on the hot air brush bandwagon and treat yourself to the upgraded version of Revlon's bestselling One-Step Volumizer. This might just be its lowest price yet. It has a detachable brush head, making it super easy to travel with. This is another editor favorite for getting smooth and shiny hair without drying it out. See why it's worth the hype in our editor's review of the Revlon One-Step Volumizer Plus. Editor Quote: "The biggest difference I noticed between this brush and others I've used in the past is how well my hairstyle stayed put. Although I think I've pretty much mastered the '90s blowout, I've often found that the look can fall throughout the day if I don't use a ton of hairspray or texture spray. I didn't use either after the Revlon One-Step Hair Dryer, and my flipped-in ends lasted even after a night of sleeping on them." — RRamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on an At-Home Hair GlossdpHUE Gloss+ ($30, originally $38) If you have color-treated hair, you know the struggle when you're in between appointments. Whether it's because your blond hair has gotten more yellow, or because your brown hair has gotten a bit brassy, sometimes you just need some at-home help. That's when we turn to the dpHUE Gloss+ at-home hair gloss. Not only does it help freshen up your color, but it will also leave your hair feeling silky smooth for up to eight washes. If that wasn't enough to convince you, check out the over 2,000 five-star reviews on Amazon.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on MinoxidilHers Hair Regrowth Treatment with 5% Topical Minoxidil Foam ($31, originally $40) Dealing with excess shedding or hair thinning? Minoxidil has been proven to improve and increase hair growth and thickness with consistent use overtime. Luckily, you can score this topical minoxidil foam treatment on sale during Prime Day. There's no better time to stock up.PS Photography | Jessica HarringtonBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Hair OilSquigs Gooseberry Delight Hair Oil ($30, originally $37) If you love to indulge in the practice of hair oiling or want to make it a part of your hair-care routine, this Squigs hair oil is a sensitive, skin-friendly option that will hydrate your scalp and deliver high-shine results. The formula is lightweight so it won't feel heavy on your scalp or clog your pores, but it also won't stain your bedding. You can use this for styling slicked-back hairstyles, too. Read more about the hair oiling process in our editor's Squigs Gooseberry Delight Hair Oil review. Editor Quote: "The biggest difference I noticed after I finished styling my hair was how soft my ends were — they felt super hydrated and healthy, despite not being trimmed in five months. My hair also had a nice shine that caught the light." — JHamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on Hair Growth SupplementsNutrafol Vegan Hair Growth Supplements ($67, originally $88) Whether you're a consistent Nutrafol user or looking to start, there's no better time to buy it while it's on sale for Prime Day. The vegan hair growth supplement contains ingredients like Moldavian dragonhead, ashwagandha, and saw palmetto that help improve your hair quality and growth rate. This is a one-month supply, but results are noticeable in three to six months.amazon.comBest Prime Day Deal on a Hair Wax StickSamnyte Hair Wax Stick ($8, originally $10) The perfect slick-back bun is within your grasp, as long as you've got the right hair wax stick to aid you in the process. We're obsessed with the Samnyte Hair Wax Stick, which has gone viral on TikTok more times than we can count. It's compact, easy to travel with, and it will tame any frizz and flyaways in just a few seconds flat.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Hair MaskMoroccanoil Intense Hydrating Mask ($34, originally $45) Show your hair some love with this deep conditioning treatment that has more than 16,000 reviews and nearly a five-star rating. This deep-conditioning mask promises to deliver softer, smoother hair that's manageable while reducing frizz and flyaways in just five minutes. It's infused with argan oil and has the most alluring amber and floral scent. You can use this once a week.PS Photography | Renee RodriguezBest Prime Day Deal on a Leave-In ConditionerUnite Hair 7Seconds Detangler Leave-In Conditioner ($27, originally $31) If you've been searching for a leave-in conditioner that will leave your hair feeling soft, smooth, and looking shiny, look no further than the Unite Hair 7Seconds Detangler Leave-In Conditioner. Not only does it completely banish knots in just seven seconds, but it also protects against heat and UV. If your hair is in need of hydration, this product belongs in your cart. Read more in our Unite Hair 7Seconds Detangler Leave-In Conditioner review. Editor Quote: "One thing I've noticed is that whether or not I choose to air-dry or blow-dry, my hair maintains a silky softness that I can usually only replicate with a laundry list of products. I've made the decision to keep this detangler at the forefront of my hair-care lineup, because I've tested the competition, and this product can't be beat." — RRPS Photography | Anvita ReddyBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Detox ShampooOuai Detox Shampoo ($26, originally $32) We all need a detox shampoo in our routine, and Ouai's Detox Shampoo is one of our favorites for clarifying our scalps. It has chelating agents and apple cider vinegar to help eliminate buildup, flakiness, and excess oil. You only need to use it once a week, so it should last a while. Read our editor's in-depth review of the Ouai Detox Shampoo for more. Editor Quote: "The shampoo effectively cleanses any excess oil and dry shampoo buildup. Yet it does not compromise on being gentle on my scalp and hair. Whenever I feel like my scalp needs a deep cleanse, whether it's from using too much product and hairspray or as a pick-me-up exfoliation treatment, it's the only product I turn to for a quick refresh and revamp." — ARamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Flat IronChi Original Ceramic Flat Iron ($55, originally $69) Chi products rarely go on sale, so grab this one for 17 percent off while you can. Customers say with just one pass, this flat iron gets their hair straight and shiny, but it can also be used to create the perfect beachy waves or bubble waves. It's great for all hair types as well.amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Hair DryerCosy Companions Hair Dryer ($95, originally $800) This powerful hair dryer delivers fast result (we're talking less than 10 minutes), and it's at an unbeatable price. This blow dryer has negative ions that help to reduce frizz, static, and flyaways. It comes with a concentrator and a diffuser for blowouts and defined curls.PS Photography | Haley LyndesBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Shark Hair ToolShark FlexStyle Hair Dryer & Powerful Styling System ($240, originally $320) If you want all your hair styling needs covered with one nifty tool, you need to get your hands on the FlexStyle Air Drying & Styling System. This ultimate set contains all seven attachments, including a diffuser, a styling concentrator, a wide-tooth comb attachment, two auto-wrap curlers, a paddle brush attachment, and a round brush attachment. Usually, you only get five according to your hair type for this price point, so you have to take advantage of this Prime Day deal. Plus, you get a set of four nonslip clips as well. Read our review of the Shark FlexStyle Air Drying & Styling System here for more. Editor Quote: "This is something I personally love because I like to get my hair almost completely dry before I style it. It has a button that allows it to rotate from its blow-dryer shape back into a styling wand, and from there you can use one of its attachments to get your desired result. As someone who was a heavy Revlon user, I personally use its oval brush to style my hair straight, and it does a great job. It's powerful and fast, and it uses low heat to style my hair." - Haley Lyndes, former assistant editor, ShoppingPS Photography | Renee RodriguezBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Dyson Hair ToolDyson Airwrap ($500, originally $600) If you have been vying for the Dyson Airwrap, it's $100 off right now for Prime Day. It comes with five different attachments: one 1.2-inch Airwrap barrel, one 1.6-inch Airwrap barrel, a soft smoothing brush, a firm smoothing brush, a round volumizing brush, and a blow-dryer attachment. Read more on how versatile this tool is in our editor's in-depth Dyson Airwrap review. Editor Quote: "Not only did the Airwrap change the way I felt about my short hair, but it also made it much easier to style. Since then, I've had every haircut imaginable — from long with tons of layers to midlength with blunt ends and even curtain bangs. Although my hair is endlessly changing, the one tool I've been able to use, no matter the hairstyle, has been my Dyson Airwrap." - RRPS Photography | Anvita ReddyBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Body LotionAmLactin Daily Moisturizing Lotion ($10, originally $25) The AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Lotion is formulated with 12 percent lactic acid and will gently exfoliate to reveal softer, smoother skin. This is great for those who have rough and dry skin, but it's also helpful for people dealing with body acne, KP, ingrown hairs, and dark spots or an uneven skin tone. It's a non-greasy formula that is fragrance-free and suitable for all skin types. One editor raved about the product in her AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Lotion review. Editor Quote: "Whenever my friends ask how I'm able to get buttery-soft skin or how my bikini line looks smooth, I pretty much credit it to consistently using AmLactin's Daily lotion. My 'strawberry skin' is practically gone; I even noticed that my underarms are lighter and more even-toned as well." — ARamazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Body WashSalt & Stone Antioxidant-Rich Body Wash in Bergamot & Hinoki ($25, originally $36) The Salt & Stone Antioxidant-Rich Body Wash will transform your shower into a spa with its revitalizing Bergamot & Hinoki scent. This body wash will soften the skin with its gentle cleanse. It also contains niacinamide and vitamin C to help brighten and nourish the skin. amazon.comBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Shower OilL'Occitane Cleansing & Softening Almond Shower Oil ($23, originally $29) Give yourself a luxurious moment in the shower with L'Occitane's Almond Shower Oil. The soothing and luxe formula starts as an oil and transforms into a delicate milky lotion that cleanses and nourishes the body when it comes in contact with water. Plus, it smells like warm almonds and vanilla. Check out our L'Occitane Cleansing & Softening Almond Shower Oil review for more details. Editor Quote: "The brand claims one bottle of this product sells every 10 seconds worldwide. It's packed with sweet almond oil and grapeseed oil, and after using it for less than a week, I can truly tell why it's so popular. Unlike traditional body washes, this shower oil foams to clean off the day, producing a sweet (and not super overpowering) fragrance that leaves my skin the smoothest it's ever been from a shower wash. Before I even step out of the shower I notice that my skin looks and feels more hydrated." — Natasha Marsh, contributing editor, ShoppingPS Photography | Renee RodriguezBest Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Body OilOsea Undaria Algae Body Oil ($41, originally $52) Osea's luxurious Undaria Algae Body Oil is a lightweight, fast-absorbing body oil that feels nourishing and hydrating on the skin. It leaves a subtle glow on the skin and it feels soft to the touch. It has a calming citrusy scent that is refreshing and light. Even one of our editors is obsessed; read her full OSEA Undaria Algae Body Oil review for more. Editor Quote: "The hydration is long lasting, and I notice that my skin feels moisturized throughout the entire day without the need for reapplication. Plus, the scent — which is beyond words — lasts for hours. It's a mix of lime and grapefruit, and it's an absolute citrus dream. I always get tons of compliments on how I smell whenever I wear it, even if I forget to spritz on perfume before leaving the house." — RRamazon.comBest Prime Day Deal on a Cuticle OilCND Solar Oil Nail and Cuticle Oil ($7, originally $10) There's nothing worse than cracked and dry cuticles, especially if you're in between manicure appointments. CND Solar Oil Nail and Cuticle Oil is an easy oil you can apply whenever you need a little extra hydration. It's made with jojoba oil, and it also features an easy applicator brush that swipes on just like regular nail polish would. Do yourself a favor and keep a bottle of this handy and we promise your nails will thank you.amazon.comBest Prime Day Deal on Teeth Whitening Strips For Sensitive TeethLumineux Teeth Whitening Strips ($15, originally $23) If you've been wanting a whiter smile, but find that most whitening options are too harsh on your sensitive teeth, we'd suggest testing out the Lumineux Teeth Whitening Strips. They're microbiome safe, certified non-toxic, and they help improve oral health without anything artificial. Key ingredients include coconut oil, Dead Sea salt, and lemon peel oil. Read the full editor review. Editor Quote: "I was a little nervous going into this trial. Yes, the past customer photos show amazing progress, so I wasn't too worried about that. What I was concerned about was tooth sensitivity. However, after giving the strips a try, I can confidently say they left me with almost no discomfort — not to mention — my teeth also looked amazing." — Taylor Augustin, PS contributoramazon.comBest Prime Day Deal on a CandleNest New York Scented Classic Candle ($68, originally $85) Nest is known for their amazing candles, which have a long burn time (50-60 hours) and throw scent all across the room. You can grab multiple scents for 20 percent off right now, but our favorite has to be Grapefruit, which is sweet and a little tangy in the best possible way.Anvita Reddy is an assistant editor for PS Shopping. She has a passion for products and is an avid reviewer of everything including furniture, mattresses, home gadgets, cookware, tech, and more. Having dealt with acne as a teenager and into adulthood, her expertise lies in beauty. She has tried and tested plenty of skin care, makeup, hair care, and countless other beauty products.

While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Beauty-lovers, the last few hours of Amazon's October Prime Day are here, and there are plenty of beauty discounts you need to take advantage of before it's too late. As shopping experts and Prime Day pros, we hunted down the best Prime Day beauty deals you don't want to miss. There is no shortage of bang-for-your-buck beauty offers, including makeup, hair care, skin care, nail care, and body care, plus several editor-favorite picks from brands like Laneige, Caudalie, and more.

This is your chance to stock up on your beauty essentials on a budget or try something new without breaking the bank. Ahead, you can check out our editor-backed and top-rated Prime Day beauty recommendations. Hurry, it's the last day to score those discounts and deals.

Our Favorite Amazon Prime Day Beauty Deals to Shop

  • The "buttery smooth skin" lotion: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Lotion at $10, originally $25
  • For diminishing breakouts: Differin Gel at $19, originally $29
  • A hair tool that can do it all: Shark FlexStyle Hair Dryer & Powerful Styling System at $240, originally $320
  • A deal on depuffing and brightening eye patches: Grace & Stella Eye Mask Eye Patch at $30, originally $55
  • A hair oil for scalp care and soft, shiny strands: Squigs Gooseberry Delight Hair Oil at $30, originally $37

Keep scrolling to shop our top picks, and if you're looking for more deals, check out PS's editor-curated Amazon Prime Day Sale picks and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Plus, make sure you sign up for Amazon Prime so that you don't miss a moment of the sale.

Update on October 9, 2024 at 8:30 PM ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Hydrating Essence

Cosrx Snail Mucin 96% Power Repairing Essence ($13, originally $25)

If you have dry, irritated skin, this viral snail mucin essence will help with hydration. The lightweight essence soothes redness, brightens the skin, and helps repair your moisture barrier without feeling greasy. Stock up on it while it's on sale for the upcoming dry winter. One editor raved about the product in her Cosrx Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Power Essence review.

Editor Quote: "My skin's texture has actually improved, and it feels way more even now. The hydration payoff is also huge, and I feel like it actually helps my moisturizer work better, too." — Kelsey Garcia, associate content director, Balance

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on Lip Balm

Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask ($17, originally $24)

The Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask is one of the bestselling items on Amazon, and it's worth stocking up on during Prime Day. This hydrating lip mask can revive even the driest lips overnight, featuring ingredients like coconut oil and shea butter. One editor raves about the product in her review of the Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask.

Editor Quote: "This lip mask isn't sticky or uncomfortable — it glides on smoothly and feels very soothing on my lips." — Macy Cate Williams, former content director, Shopping

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on Teeth Whitening Strips

Crest 3D Whitestrips ($30, originally $46)

Brighten your teeth in just one use with the Crest 3D Whitestrips. It comes with a total of 44 strips, including two bonus one hour express treatments. The key ingredient here is hydrogen peroxide, which helps lift stains from coffee, tea, and wine. Apply the no-slip strips to top and bottom teeth, let them sit for 30 minutes, and remove them. One PS editor detailed her experience using the strips in her review of the Crest 3D Whitestrips.

Editor Quote: "After just four treatments, the difference is already remarkable. The 'before' image on the left and the 'after' image on the right clearly show the noticeable change. And I've barely made a dent in the box with plenty of treatments left." — Marisa Petrarca, PS contributor

Best Prime Day Deal on Eye Patches

Grace & Stella Eye Mask Eye Patch ($30, originally $55)

Constantly suffering from puffy under eyes? Don't worry, the Grace & Stella Eye Mask Eye Patch set has you covered. They're formulated to treat puffiness, dark circles, and fine lines, which makes them the perfect pick to add to your morning routine. Use them as a way to brighten up your under-eye area after waking up, or wear them while you apply eye makeup to avoid any issues with eyeshadow fallout. It comes with 48 pairs.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Lip Balm

Laneige Lip Glowy Balm ($13, originally $19)

If you love the bestselling Lip Sleeping Mask from Laneige, you'll also love this Glowy Balm version as well. The difference between the two is that this one is slightly less thick but perfect for on-the-go use. The Glowy Balm also has a shinier finish that's perfect for topping off your lip, and it comes in a bunch of flavors. Learn more in our Laneige Lip Glowy Balm review.

Editor Quote: "What's nice about the lip balm is that it has a similar consistency to the fan-favorite Lip Sleeping Mask — the brand's creamy overnight lip treatment — but slightly thinner and therefore better suited to wear throughout the day. Plus, the tube applicator makes it easy to swipe on when on the go, and it fits easily inside a purse or a pocket." — Kelsey Garcia, associate content director, Balance

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on Acne Patches

Hero Cosmetics Original Mighty Patch ($16, originally $22)

The Mighty Patch from Hero Cosmetics are there for all your breakout woes. These medical-grade hydrocolloid patches diminish blemishes practically overnight by absorbing all the gunk from your whiteheads. With these in your skin-care arsenal, you won't be tempted to pick and prod at your zits. It comes with 72 patches. Learn more in our editor's review of the Mighty Patch patches.

Editor Quote: "From its unmatched staying power to the undeniable results, I can say that the Hero Cosmetics Mighty Acne Patch truly lives up to the hype. Thanks to its gel formula, the patch gently clings to the skin for hours while effortlessly absorbing all of the gunk in the pimple. This is great, whether you're a heavy sleeper or on the go all day. It also helps you beat the annoying temptation of picking at your face, which helps prevent scabs and scarring caused by popping pimples." — Naomi Parris, PS contributor

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on Hydrating Sheet Masks

Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask ($13, originally $19)

The viral Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask is on sale during Prime Day, and it's the perfect time to stock up on the deeply hydrating sheet mask. It is supposed to help minimize the appearance of pores and deliver glass-skin and firming results. This set comes with four treatments, which is a steal for only $13. Use it whenever you need a hydration boost, including post-flight. Read our Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask review for more.

Editor Quote: "I find it to be ultra-hydrating, and it hasn't bothered my acne-prone skin or exacerbated any breakouts. I fully plan on continuing to purchase this mask and use it once a week, especially the night before a date or a special event." - Renee Rodriguez, staff writer and social producer

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on an Eye Cream

Beauty of Joseon Revive Eye Serum ($11, originally $17)

Formulated with retinal and niacinamide, this eye treatment will help brighten the undereye area, diminishing dark circles and fine lines. It's a gentle yet effective treatment suitable for all skin types. Store it in the fridge for an extra cooling, depuffing effect.

Best Prime Day Deal on a Lip Serum

Lux Unfiltered No. 15 Soothing Lip Serum ($21, originally $26)

Make dry, cracked lips a thing of the past with the Lux Unfiltered No. 15 Soothing Lip Serum. It's packed with hydrating ingredients like hyaluronic acid, squalane, and liquid shea butter. Plus, the packaging features a cooling applicator tip, which makes for an even more luxurious experience.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on Micellar Water

Bioderma Sensibio H2O Micellar Water ($13, originally $19)

Take the day off with the cult-favorite Bioderma Sensibio H2O Micellar Water. It removes even the most stubborn eye makeup, all with a few swipes. Plus, it's great for all skin types. With this price cut, you might as well add a few to your cart and stock up.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on Tinted Sunscreen

EltaMD UV Physical Tinted Sunscreen SPF 41 ($35, originally $44)

EltaMD's sunscreens are a dermatologist favorite and sensitive-friendly, so when you can get it on sale, you might as well stock up. This tinted mineral sunscreen from EltaMD is great for those with acne-prone or sensitive skin. It's nongreasy and leaves a matte finish.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on an Exfoliating Toner

Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant ($28, originally $35)

From breakouts to enlarged pores, the Paula's Choice Skin Perfecting 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant is a bestseller and viral favorite for those with acne-prone or oily skin. It contains salicylic acid to gently exfoliate the skin while clearing up pores. There's no better time to stock up.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Sunscreen

Innisfree Daily UV Defense Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 36 ($13, originally $18)

The Innisfree sunscreen feels like a lightweight moisturizer with its water-based formula. Containing skin-calming ingredients like green tea, cica, and sunflower seed oil, this product is perfect for all skin types. Plus, it doesn't leave behind a white cast, but rather a hydrated glow. Read more in our Innisfree Daily UV Defense Sunscreen review.

Editor Quote: "In comparison to many other sunscreens I've tried in the past, the Innisfree Daily UV Defense Sunscreen has the best texture. It's smooth and creamy, kind of like a balmy moisturizer, but it still feels so refreshing and lightweight on the skin that I often forget I have SPF on and accidentally double up (which is never a bad idea). Plus, it sets and absorbs nearly immediately after I blend it in. I'm left with a subtle, dewy glow with a natural, skin-like finish. It doesn't make me look like a glazed doughnut, but I don't look extra oily or shiny, either." — AR

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on an Acne Treatment

Differin Acne Treatment Gel ($19, originally $29)

If you have acne-prone skin, there's no better time to stock up on the Differin Acne Treatment Gel. The 0.1 percent adapalene gel is a retinoid treatment best used at night to help diminish acne, post-acne marks, and discoloration over time. Although similar to its prescription strength counterpart, this treatment is a gentler option if you're looking for something effective but not as potent. Learn more about one editor's experience with the product in her review of the Differin Acne Treatment Gel.

Editor Quote: "It only took about a month for my skin to get used to, and now, I use it every night with zero irritation. I'm not going to sit here and tell you the Differin Acne Treatment and Differin Acne Treatment alone cleared up my acne, because that's not the case — the spironolactone prescription had a large hand in that — but I can tell you the gel has helped brighten and even out my complexion to the point that you can hardly tell I ever experienced those hormonal breakouts to begin with." — Jessica Harrington, senior editor, Beauty

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Cleansing Oil

Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil ($14, originally $20)

Oil cleansing does wonders for gently breaking down makeup, sunscreen, and the grime from the day. However, it can also help with eliminating blackheads and clearing out your pores. The Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil will do just that with its soothing formula containing heartleaf extract. Just massage this into your skin for a minute or two, emulsify it into a milky texture with a little bit of water, and wash it away for a smoother, softer complexion.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Hydrating Toner

Laneige Cream Skin Refillable Toner & Moisturizer ($25, originally $36)

Laneige's Cream Skin Refillable Toner & Moisturizer is another viral product from the brand for its skin-fortifying capabilities. This milky toner is packed with ceramides and peptides to deeply hydrate and repair the skin without feeling too heavy. Whether you're a retinol user or tend to have a damaged skin barrier, this will help diminish irritation and flakiness. Stock up while it's on a major markdown.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Cleanser

La Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Facial Cleanser ($14, originally $18)

If you have normal to oily/combination skin, the La Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Facial Cleanser is a no-nonsense cleanser that will get the job done. It is gentle on skin while still being effective enough to remove dirt, makeup, and excess oil. It's formulated with ceramides, niacinamide, and glycerin to help the skin maintain its moisture barrier. It's worth stocking up on while it's under $15.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Sunscreen

Bliss Block Star Invisible Daily Sunscreen SPF 30 ($12, originally $25)

Save a few bucks on this editor-favorite sunscreen that's acne prone and sensitive skin-friendly. The 100 percent mineral formula has a light tint, which makes it perfect for no makeup-makeup days. Read our full Bliss Block Star Invisible Daily Sunscreen review.

Editor Quote: "The texture is my favorite part — it's incredibly lightweight and silky, and dries to a soft, blurred finish that's not matte but also not dewy. It just looks like healthy skin. Very little effort is required to blend it in, which makes the application experience all the more enjoyable. I have a normal skin type, but I find the product hydrating without being greasy." — JH

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Moisturizer

Tula Skin Care 24-7 Hydrating Day & Night Cream ($34, originally $54)

If you're looking for a hydrating moisturizer for the summer, the Tula Skin Care 24-7 Hydrating Day & Night Cream is lightweight and great for all skin types. It's formulated with hyaluronic acid, apple, watermelon, peptides, squalane, and a proprietary blend of prebiotics and probiotic extracts to help repair the skin's barrier.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Retinol

Obagi360 Retinol 0.5 Cream ($60, originally $75)

If you're someone who wants to get into the retinol game but needs something gentle, this one by Obagi360 is perfect for those with sensitive skin. You get all the benefits of retinol — including a reduced appearance of fine lines and dark spots — without the irritation. It's best to use this at night. You can try using it once or twice a week, and work up to using it every other day.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Dark Spot Serum

Caudalie Vinoperfect Brightening Dark Spot Serum ($66, originally $82)

We're huge fans of Caudalie's Vinoperfect Radiance Serum, but we also know how pricey it is, so why not take advantage of the 20 percent off savings and stock up? Formulated with grapevine sap, which is said to have more brightening effects than vitamin C, this serum delivers radiance and an even skin tone with consistent use. Whether you're dealing with dark spots and hyperpigmentation or overall dullness, this gentle formula is perfect for those with sensitive skin. Read one editor's thoughts and see before-and-after pictures in her Caudalie Vinoperfect Brightening Dark Spot Serum review.

Editor Quote: "It is one of the best gentle dark spot treatments on the market. No matter how many products I try, I always come back to this serum. When I need to scale back my routine and take a gentler approach, this formula allows me to do so and continue to target my hyperpigmentation and even out my skin tone. Plus, it helps with hydrating and calming my skin." — AR

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Cleansing Balm

Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm ($48, originally $69)

The Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm has a silky texture that makes removing your makeup a relaxing experience. It starts as a gel-like balm but transforms into a milky oil as it's massaged into the skin with water. To see why it's worth it, check out our review of the Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm.

Editor Quote: "Within seconds, the formula melts even waterproof makeup formulas off of my face. What's more, my skin feels softer to the touch immediately after cleansing. Forget the feeling of stripped skin — this balm will leave your complexion feeling wildly silky and soothed." — Marisa Petrarca, PS Contributor

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on Peel Pads

Dr. Dennis Gross Alpha Beta Universal Daily Peel Pads ($122, originally $153)

If you want the effectiveness of an in-office peel from the comfort of your home — and at a fraction of the price — that's where the Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare's peel pads come in. The two-step process is great for brightening the skin while fading existing dark spots and preventing breakouts. It has a potent blend of glycolic acid, salicylic acid, and lactic acid as the first step. The second step helps to neutralize any inflammation. This value size box has 60 treatments, which should last you at least two months if you use it daily, or even longer if it's something you use every other day or less.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on Vitamin C Serum

Tatcha Violet-C Brightening Serum ($62, originally $89)

Several products from Tatcha are on sale during Prime Day, and we're adding this powerful Violet-C Brightening Serum to our carts. This serum is gentle yet effective in fading dark spots and brightening your skin. It's formulated with 20 percent vitamin C and a 10 percent AHA blend, a potent mix that is meant to be used at night.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Tinted Moisturizer

BareMinerals Complexion Rescue Tinted Moisturizer SPF 30 ($31, originally $39)

BareMinerals's Complexion Rescue Tinted Moisturizer is all you need to streamline your morning routine for a "no-makeup" makeup look. The tinted moisturizer has a decent amount of coverage for a tinted moisturizer with it's medium-buildable wear. It has a skin-like luminous finish that feels hydrating on the skin. Read the full editor review.

Editor Quote: "Filled with skin-loving ingredients, specifically protective ingredients such as titanium dioxide and iron oxides, BareMinerals will be my complexion's lifelong daytime best friend. It's truly made embracing 'skinimalism' that much easier." — Anvita Reddy, assistant editor, commerce

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Brow Pencil

Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Wiz ($15, originally $25)

Anastasia Beverly Hills's Brow Wiz glides on with ease and delivers the most natural look. The double-ended spoolie brush allows you to shape your arches to perfection before and after penciling. Start with light, feathery strokes that mimic your actual brow hairs, then fill in more heavily in sparse areas. It comes in a variety of colors.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Foundation

Lancôme Teint Idole Ultra Wear Buildable Full Coverage Foundation ($40, originally $57)

The bestselling Lancôme Teint Idole Ultra Wear Foundation is on sale right now, and it's the perfect time to stock up for those holiday parties. It has a lightweight feel but a full coverage wear, so you'll have a flawless base without feeling cakey. It has a gorgeous skin-like matte finish as well.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Mascara

It Cosmetics Superhero Mascara ($16, originally $28)

The It Cosmetics Superhero Mascara is under $25, and it's worth stocking up on. It gives your lashes an instant lift, as well as volumizes and lengthens to give you a fluttery, fanned-out look. It's lengthening without the clumps, and the unique shape of the brush lets you reach and separate every lash from root to tip.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Blowdryer Brush

Revlon One Step Volumizer Plus 2.0 Hair Dryer and Hot Air Brush ($37, originally $70)

Get on the hot air brush bandwagon and treat yourself to the upgraded version of Revlon's bestselling One-Step Volumizer. This might just be its lowest price yet. It has a detachable brush head, making it super easy to travel with. This is another editor favorite for getting smooth and shiny hair without drying it out. See why it's worth the hype in our editor's review of the Revlon One-Step Volumizer Plus.

Editor Quote: "The biggest difference I noticed between this brush and others I've used in the past is how well my hairstyle stayed put. Although I think I've pretty much mastered the '90s blowout, I've often found that the look can fall throughout the day if I don't use a ton of hairspray or texture spray. I didn't use either after the Revlon One-Step Hair Dryer, and my flipped-in ends lasted even after a night of sleeping on them." — RR

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on an At-Home Hair Gloss

dpHUE Gloss+ ($30, originally $38)

If you have color-treated hair, you know the struggle when you're in between appointments. Whether it's because your blond hair has gotten more yellow, or because your brown hair has gotten a bit brassy, sometimes you just need some at-home help. That's when we turn to the dpHUE Gloss+ at-home hair gloss. Not only does it help freshen up your color, but it will also leave your hair feeling silky smooth for up to eight washes. If that wasn't enough to convince you, check out the over 2,000 five-star reviews on Amazon.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on Minoxidil

Hers Hair Regrowth Treatment with 5% Topical Minoxidil Foam ($31, originally $40)

Dealing with excess shedding or hair thinning? Minoxidil has been proven to improve and increase hair growth and thickness with consistent use overtime. Luckily, you can score this topical minoxidil foam treatment on sale during Prime Day. There's no better time to stock up.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on Hair Oil

Squigs Gooseberry Delight Hair Oil ($30, originally $37)

If you love to indulge in the practice of hair oiling or want to make it a part of your hair-care routine, this Squigs hair oil is a sensitive, skin-friendly option that will hydrate your scalp and deliver high-shine results. The formula is lightweight so it won't feel heavy on your scalp or clog your pores, but it also won't stain your bedding. You can use this for styling slicked-back hairstyles, too. Read more about the hair oiling process in our editor's Squigs Gooseberry Delight Hair Oil review.

Editor Quote: "The biggest difference I noticed after I finished styling my hair was how soft my ends were — they felt super hydrated and healthy, despite not being trimmed in five months. My hair also had a nice shine that caught the light." — JH

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on Hair Growth Supplements

Nutrafol Vegan Hair Growth Supplements ($67, originally $88)

Whether you're a consistent Nutrafol user or looking to start, there's no better time to buy it while it's on sale for Prime Day. The vegan hair growth supplement contains ingredients like Moldavian dragonhead, ashwagandha, and saw palmetto that help improve your hair quality and growth rate. This is a one-month supply, but results are noticeable in three to six months.

Best Prime Day Deal on a Hair Wax Stick

Samnyte Hair Wax Stick ($8, originally $10)

The perfect slick-back bun is within your grasp, as long as you've got the right hair wax stick to aid you in the process. We're obsessed with the Samnyte Hair Wax Stick, which has gone viral on TikTok more times than we can count. It's compact, easy to travel with, and it will tame any frizz and flyaways in just a few seconds flat.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Hair Mask

Moroccanoil Intense Hydrating Mask ($34, originally $45)

Show your hair some love with this deep conditioning treatment that has more than 16,000 reviews and nearly a five-star rating. This deep-conditioning mask promises to deliver softer, smoother hair that's manageable while reducing frizz and flyaways in just five minutes. It's infused with argan oil and has the most alluring amber and floral scent. You can use this once a week.

Best Prime Day Deal on a Leave-In Conditioner

Unite Hair 7Seconds Detangler Leave-In Conditioner ($27, originally $31)

If you've been searching for a leave-in conditioner that will leave your hair feeling soft, smooth, and looking shiny, look no further than the Unite Hair 7Seconds Detangler Leave-In Conditioner. Not only does it completely banish knots in just seven seconds, but it also protects against heat and UV. If your hair is in need of hydration, this product belongs in your cart. Read more in our Unite Hair 7Seconds Detangler Leave-In Conditioner review.

Editor Quote: "One thing I've noticed is that whether or not I choose to air-dry or blow-dry, my hair maintains a silky softness that I can usually only replicate with a laundry list of products. I've made the decision to keep this detangler at the forefront of my hair-care lineup, because I've tested the competition, and this product can't be beat." — RR

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Detox Shampoo

Ouai Detox Shampoo ($26, originally $32)

We all need a detox shampoo in our routine, and Ouai's Detox Shampoo is one of our favorites for clarifying our scalps. It has chelating agents and apple cider vinegar to help eliminate buildup, flakiness, and excess oil. You only need to use it once a week, so it should last a while. Read our editor's in-depth review of the Ouai Detox Shampoo for more.

Editor Quote: "The shampoo effectively cleanses any excess oil and dry shampoo buildup. Yet it does not compromise on being gentle on my scalp and hair. Whenever I feel like my scalp needs a deep cleanse, whether it's from using too much product and hairspray or as a pick-me-up exfoliation treatment, it's the only product I turn to for a quick refresh and revamp." — AR

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Flat Iron

Chi Original Ceramic Flat Iron ($55, originally $69)

Chi products rarely go on sale, so grab this one for 17 percent off while you can. Customers say with just one pass, this flat iron gets their hair straight and shiny, but it can also be used to create the perfect beachy waves or bubble waves. It's great for all hair types as well.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Hair Dryer

Cosy Companions Hair Dryer ($95, originally $800)

This powerful hair dryer delivers fast result (we're talking less than 10 minutes), and it's at an unbeatable price. This blow dryer has negative ions that help to reduce frizz, static, and flyaways. It comes with a concentrator and a diffuser for blowouts and defined curls.

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Shark Hair Tool

Shark FlexStyle Hair Dryer & Powerful Styling System ($240, originally $320)

If you want all your hair styling needs covered with one nifty tool, you need to get your hands on the FlexStyle Air Drying & Styling System. This ultimate set contains all seven attachments, including a diffuser, a styling concentrator, a wide-tooth comb attachment, two auto-wrap curlers, a paddle brush attachment, and a round brush attachment. Usually, you only get five according to your hair type for this price point, so you have to take advantage of this Prime Day deal. Plus, you get a set of four nonslip clips as well. Read our review of the Shark FlexStyle Air Drying & Styling System here for more.

Editor Quote: "This is something I personally love because I like to get my hair almost completely dry before I style it. It has a button that allows it to rotate from its blow-dryer shape back into a styling wand, and from there you can use one of its attachments to get your desired result. As someone who was a heavy Revlon user, I personally use its oval brush to style my hair straight, and it does a great job. It's powerful and fast, and it uses low heat to style my hair." - Haley Lyndes, former assistant editor, Shopping

Best Prime Day Beauty Deal on a Dyson Hair Tool
